summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Advanced Bonus System with Financial, RTP, FreeSpin, and Cashback bonus types. Successfully verified bonus creation, listing, category tabs, and type selection functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Old bonus creation format with 'type': 'deposit' fails validation - requires proper enum values
minor_issues.impact: Legacy bonus creation calls need to use proper BonusType enum values

ui_bugs.issue: DOM detachment when rapidly selecting dropdown options
Occasional timeout when clicking tabs due to overlay interception

passed_tests: Advanced Bonus System API - All 4 bonus categories created successfully
High Roller bonus creation with proper Financial category and rules
RTP Booster bonus with luck boost factors and spin counts
Free Spin Package with game IDs and bet values
Ladder bonus with multi-tier reward structure
Category tabs navigation (Financial, RTP, Non-Deposit, FreeSpin, Cashback)
Bonus type dropdown filtering based on selected category
Bonus listing with proper badges showing category, type, and trigger
Wager requirements and reward percentage display
